summary: Tami, a young girl who has just moved to Oregon, stands up against her coach and the naysayers of her small town to prove that she's capable of being a talented football quarterback despite her gender.
cast: Don Murray|Barbara Babcock|Dana Elcar|John Stockwell|Daphne Zuniga|Helen Hunt|Mary-Robin Redd|Joshua Cadman|Severn Darden|Carmen Argenziano|Nancy Parsons|Tim Robbins|Holly Bressler|Katherine Moir|Melanie Parker|Michael Currie|Beau Dremann|Vincent Barbour|John Wesley|Kathleen Wilhoite|Jonna Lee|Scott Culbertson|Alex Schrage|Paul Sinclair|Dominique Steffanoff|Kim Carbone|Mary Marsh|Anne Whitfield|Cheryl Cantwell|Brian Luttrell|Dana Garrett|Rick Metzger|Pat Hellberg|Janice Maureen Odell|Lia Romaine
title: La princesa del estadio
